summary: This bill, the "Undoing Nationwide Programs and Limiting Unnecessary Grants for Electric Vehicles Act" (UNPLUG EVs Act), aims to rescind unobligated funds from electric vehicle charging and fueling grants (Title 23, United States Code, section 151(f)) and the National Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Formula Program (Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act, Public Law 117–58). These rescinded funds would be deposited into the general fund of the Treasury specifically for deficit reduction.
